All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo, CompiliationThreadCompleteListener
public class CSSCompilerMojo
extends AbstractCompilerMojo

Parses include statements in JavaScript files and generates single file CSS files.

Author:
alex

Field Detail

themes

public String[] themes
A list of theme names, if supported. Themes should be directories under $cssDirectory. So if you had the following directory structure: 
 src/main/css/blueTheme
 src/main/css/redTheme
You'd use: blueTheme redTheme

outputDirectory

protected File outputDirectory
Where the CSS files are to be stored
